item.title: T1 Lease Costs Reduced Again
item.description:
In the past, T1 lines were a costly telecommunication option accessible only to large companies and the telecom sector. While competition has significantly lowered prices since then, there’s been another recent plunge. But what’s driving this trend? Originally, T1 lines, part of the T-Carrier telephony standard, were trunk lines connecting central offices within telephone companies. Later, corporate telecom departments adopted them for PBX phone systems and internet service. They became crucial for local internet providers, particularly dial-up services...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/t1-lease-costs-reduced-again/
